name: Birb Hatching Simulator
description:
WARNING!!!!

This game has no save file feature, so if you play the game, your progress will be deleted the next time you play, I'm so sorry I have absolutely no clue how to make it save  😟😟😟😟

Henlo!! This is the game where you hatch birbs and try to get all the birbs, there are codes that you can type to get coins and exclusive birbs, I will be giving away those codes on Twitter!

Follow AllieGamer1 for the codes (it's an old account so pls ignore the cringy username)

need help?  something not working? email meh!
